title: Cottage pie
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) beef mince', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '500g (1 1/4 lb) onions, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 sprigs thyme, chopped', '2 tablespoon tomato purée', '1 tablespoon flour', '200ml (7 fl oz) red wine', '5 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1L (1 3/4 pints) chicken stock', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) Desirée potatoes, peeled and halved', '2 egg yolks']
